Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.GUI

Class GUIBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.screens.Screen
      • view.screens.BoardScreen
        • view.GUI.GUIBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer, GUIController, View
    public class GUIBoard
extends BoardScreen
implements GUIController
    This class represents the GUI controller during the real game (after the pick god phase)
